scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run triggerAllTests-headless && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-regression-automationteststore: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run triggerAllTests-automationteststore && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-one-test: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run testAlias && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-multi-browser: npm run triggerAllTests-automationteststore -- --browser electron --headed & npm run triggerAllTests-automationteststore -- --browser edge --headed
